commands.name: audit
commands.summary: Runs npm audit for the entire monorepo
commands.description: Scans the entire monorepo for security vulnerabilities via npm audit

commands.name: fix-copyrights
commands.summary: Fixes whitespace-only changes caused by broken copyright linter
commands.description: Manually runs the new copyright linter on all files changed between the current branch and master.

commands.name: clean
commands.summary: Cleans build output within each package
commands.description: Iterates through each package in the monorepo and runs the 'clean' script

commands.name: compile
commands.summary: Run compile script for each package
commands.description: Runs the 'compile' script for each package in the monorepo. For most packages, 'compile' is equivalent to 'build'. For react apps, it skips webpacking etc.

commands.name: cover
commands.summary: Run cover script for each package
commands.description: Iterates through each package in the monorepo and runs the 'cover' script

commands.name: docs
commands.summary: Builds the API reference docs for each package
commands.description: Iterates through each package in the monorepo and runs the 'docs' script

commands.name: extract-api
commands.summary: Run api-extractor to generate API signature files
commands.description: Iterates through each package in the monorepo and runs the 'extract-api' script

commands.name: lint
commands.summary: Run lint rules on each package
commands.description: Iterates through each package in the monorepo and runs the 'lint' script

commands.name: test
commands.summary: Run test script for each package
commands.description: Iterates through each package in the monorepo and runs the 'test' script

commands.name: test:integration
commands.summary: Run test:integration script for each package
commands.description: Iterates through each package in the monorepo and runs the 'test:integration' script
